EmailTemplate.name: Jumpstart Follow up email.Sorry we have missed you
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry to have missed you at the VMTurbo Jumpstart Training
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
We were sorry to have missed you at the VMTurbo Jumpstart webcast on July 19th. But, hey, things come up, right? The good news is that we are glad to provide you with a recorded version <http://support.vmturbo.com/forums/21120432-training> of the training here. Be aware that you will need to login with your VMTurbo Support Portal credentials to view the webcast.
If you have any questions that arise as you view it, please let us know.
We look forward to bringing you more of these types of webinars in the future and would be happy about comments or suggestions as to how we can improve them, in our short survey. <https://www.surveymonkey.com/s/F8N6DSX>
We are looking forward to seeing you at one of our upcoming events again.
Sincerely, The VMTurbo Team Marketo, Inc. 901 Mariners Island Blvd., San Francisco, CA, 94404
Contact Us <#>
